Posts.EditableText:
There is a "Let's Play" BEYOND EXILE 3.0 The Director's Cut now available. 

It is located here: 

[url:2w3pwr10]http://www.shrimptrawler.net/Beyond_Exile/Lets_Play/BE30_01thats_divx.html[/url:2w3pwr10]

A "making of" this project is located here: 

[url:2w3pwr10]http://www.shrimptrawler.net/Beyond_Exile/Lets_Play/BE30_01intro_divx.html[/url:2w3pwr10] 

...and the Table of Contents for the book/adventure is located here: 

[url:2w3pwr10]http://www.shrimptrawler.net/Beyond_Exile/Lets_Play/BE30_toc.html[/url:2w3pwr10]

You will need a DIVX web player to view these .mov files
